mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE employee_number = #{employeeNumber} AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE dingtalk_userid = #{dingtalkUserId} AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE status != 'RESIGNED' AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE (status != 'RESIGNED' OR status IS NULL) AND deleted = 0 ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE dingtalk_userid IS NOT NULL AND dingtalk_userid != '' AND deleted = 0
SELECT * FROM sys_user WHERE id = #{id} AND deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (username, password, real_name, employee_number, first_work_date, entry_date, social_seniority, role_id, dingtalk_userid, status, resignation_date, create_time, deleted) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{realName}, #{employeeNumber}, #{firstWorkDate}, #{entryDate}, #{socialSeniority}, #{roleId}, #{dingtalkUserId}, #{status}, #{resignationDate}, #{createTime}, #{deleted})
mapper.delete: UPDATE sys_user SET deleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
